Ability.Description: Deals 1253 Life damage over 16s. Increases the Mage's Dodge chance by 10%.

Rank.Description: Blade buffs increase your chance to Parry attacks by 2% and increase the damage of your Slashing attacks by 1%.
Blade buffs increase your chance to Parry attacks by 4% and increase the damage of your Slashing attacks by 2%.
Blade buffs increase your chance to Parry attacks by 6% and increase the damage of your Slashing attacks by 3%.

Ability.Description: Deals 480 to 531 Life damage. Increases the damage slashing attacks deal to the enemy by 5% for 30s. Counts as a Slashing attack. Does not stack with Ice Shear.

Rank.Description: Reduces the cast time of your Vorpal Slash by 50%.
Reduces the cast time of your Vorpal Slash by 100%.
When you Dodge or Parry an attack, you have a 50% chance to deal damage, based on your Spell Power, to the attacker.
When you Dodge or Parry an attack, you have a 100% chance to deal damage, based on your Spell Power, to the attacker.

Ability.Description: Teleports the Mage backwards 20 meters. Removes all crowd control effects.

Rank.Description: Increases the damage of your Lightning Blade and Reaper's Blade by 20%.
Increases the damage of your Lightning Blade and Reaper's Blade by 40%.
Allows Blade Rush to be used in combat and gives it a 50% chance to stun the enemy for up to 4 seconds.
Allows Blade Rush to be used in combat and gives it a 100% chance to stun the enemy for up to 4 seconds.
Increases the cast time reduction provided by the Eldritch Armor proc to 2.25 seconds and reduces the global cooldown of cast time abilities using the proc effect to 1 second.
Increases the cast time reduction provided by the Eldritch Armor proc to 2.5 seconds and reduces the global cooldown of cast time abilities using the proc effect to 0.5 seconds.
Your Lucent Slash will refresh your active Blazing Light on the enemy.
Your successful Critical Hits have a 50% chance to place an absorb shield on you for up to 5 seconds, absorbing up to 5% of your Maximum Health. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.
Your successful Critical Hits have a 100% chance to place an absorb shield on you for up to 5 seconds, absorbing up to 5% of your Maximum Health. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

Ability.Description: Restores 693 to 766 health to the Mage. Cooldown is reset if the Mage is Critically Hit. Cannot reset more than once every 5s.
Restores 693 to 766 health to the Mage. Cooldown is reset if the Mage is Critically Hit. Cannot reset more than once every 5s.
Teleports the Mage behind up to 5 enemies, dealing 940 to 1039 Air damage to each.

Rank.Description: Gives your Conditioned Response a 10% chance to reset its cooldown when you are damaged while below 50% health. Cannot occur more than once every 5 seconds.
Gives your Conditioned Response a 20% chance to reset its cooldown when you are damaged while below 50% health. Cannot occur more than once every 5 seconds.
Gives your Conditioned Response a 30% chance to reset its cooldown when you are damaged while below 50% health. Cannot occur more than once every 5 seconds.
Reduces the global cooldown generated by your Slashing attacks to 1.25 seconds and reduces their mana cost by 16%.
Reduces the global cooldown generated by your Slashing attacks to 1 second and reduces their mana cost by 33%.

Ability.Description: Marks the enemy for 15s. Damaging single target attacks by the Mage on another enemy, deal their damage to the marked enemy as well. Reduces the Mage's damage by 10%.

Rank.Description: Incoming damage has a 5% chance to cause you to heal for 5% of your Maximum Health. Cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
Incoming damage has a 10% chance to cause you to heal for 5% of your Maximum Health. Cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
Incoming damage has a 15% chance to cause you to heal for 5% of your Maximum Health. Cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
In addition to its original effects, Charged Blade increases all damage by 5%.
In addition to its original effects, Charged Blade increases all damage by 10%.
